title: get_geoid — get_geoid
text: get_geoid

title: get_geoid — get_geoid
text: location data frame columns "lon" "lat" acs_geometry list acs geometries acs_geometry block group level, returned GEOID block group target location. Likewise, acs_geometry census tract level, GEOID returned census tract containing target location. location lies edge multiple geographies, first detected geography returned. multiple geographies detected, multiple_intersections flag set TRUE.
